meanings.definition: A place where pine trees are grown.
meanings.sent1: The pineries were filled with tall pine trees.
meanings.sent2: We visited the local pineries to see how pine trees are grown.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels in the pineries were experts at climbing pine trees.
meanings.sent4: The pineries stood like soldiers in rows, guarding the forest.
meanings.sent5: The scent of pine in the pineries was strong and refreshing.

meanings.definition: The business of growing pine trees for timber.
meanings.sent1: Many people work in the pineries to harvest pine trees for wood.
meanings.sent2: The economy of the town relies heavily on the success of the pineries.
meanings.sent3: The pineries had a sale on pine trees, but no one wanted to buy.
meanings.sent4: The pineries were like a treasure trove of timber waiting to be used.
meanings.sent5: The machinery in the pineries hummed as the workers prepared the pine trees for cutting.
